description: Telegraf host metrics dashboard with TDengine grafana plugin.

targets.sql: SELECT last(uptime) FROM $database.system WHERE host = '$server' and _ts >= now - 1h and _ts <= now interval($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last(load5) FROM $database.system WHERE host = '$server' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last(zombies) FROM $database.processes WHERE host = '$server' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(PREV)
SELECT last(total) FROM $database.processes WHERE host = '$server' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last(total_threads) FROM $database.processes WHERE host = '$server' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last(usage_idle) * -1 + 100 FROM $database.cpu WHERE (host = '$server' and cpu = 'cpu-total') and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last(used_percent) FROM $database.mem WHERE (host = '$server') and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last(used_percent) FROM $database.swap WHERE (host = '$server') and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last(used_percent) FROM $database.disk WHERE (host = '$server' and path = '/') and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last(usage_iowait) FROM $database.cpu WHERE (host = '$server' and cpu = 'cpu-total') and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)

SELECT avg(usage_user) as _user, avg(usage_system) as system, avg(usage_softirq) as softirq, avg(usage_steal) as steal, avg(usage_nice) as nice, avg(usage_irq) as irq, avg(usage_iowait) as iowait, avg(usage_guest) as guest, avg(usage_guest_nice) as guest_nice FROM $database.cpu WHERE host = '$server' and cpu = 'cpu-total' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval)
SELECT avg(load1) as short,avg(load5) as medium,avg(load15) as long FROM $database.system WHERE host = '$server' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval)

SELECT avg(running) as running, avg(blocked) as blocked, avg(sleeping) as sleeping, avg(stopped) as stopped, avg(zombies) as zombies, avg(paging) as paging, avg(unknown) as unknown FROM $database.processes WHERE host = '$server' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval)

SELECT avg(total) as total, avg(used) as used, avg(cached) as cached, avg(free) as free, avg(buffered) as buffered FROM $database.mem WHERE host = '$server' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval)

select derivative(context_switches, 1s, 0) as context FROM (SELECT avg(context_switches) as context_switches FROM $database.kernel WHERE host = '$server' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) )

select derivative(processes_forked, 1s, 0) as context FROM (SELECT avg(processes_forked) as processes_forked FROM $database.kernel WHERE host = '$server' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval))
SELECT avg(file_max) as max FROM $database.linux_sysctl_fs WHERE host = '$server' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
SELECT avg(file_nr) as opened FROM $database.linux_sysctl_fs WHERE host = '$server' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(total, 1s, 0) as total FROM (SELECT avg(total) as total FROM $database.interrupts WHERE host = '$server' and irq = '$irq' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval))

SELECT avg(usage_user) as usage_user, avg(usage_system) as system, avg(usage_softirq) as softirq, avg(usage_steal) as steal, avg(usage_nice) as nice, avg(usage_irq) as irq, avg(usage_iowait) as iowait, avg(usage_guest) as guest, avg(usage_guest_nice) as guest_nice FROM $database.cpu WHERE host = '$server' and cpu = '$cpu' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval)
SELECT avg(ip_conntrack_count) as current FROM $database.conntrack WHERE (host = '$server') and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
SELECT avg(ip_conntrack_max) as max FROM $database.conntrack WHERE (host = '$server') and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)

SELECT avg(tcp_close) as CLOSED, avg(tcp_close_wait) as CLOSE_WAIT, avg(tcp_closing) as CLOSING, avg(tcp_established) as ESTABLISHED, avg(tcp_fin_wait1) as FIN_WAIT1, avg(tcp_fin_wait2) as FIN_WAIT2, avg(tcp_last_ack) as LAST_ACK, avg(tcp_syn_recv) as SYN_RECV, avg(tcp_syn_sent) as SYN_SENT, avg(tcp_time_wait) as TIME_WAIT FROM $database.netstat WHERE host = '$server' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval)

SELECT derivative(tcp_estabresets, 1s, 0) as tcp_estabresets FROM (SELECT avg(tcp_estabresets) as tcp_estabresets FROM $database.net WHERE host = '$server' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval))

SELECT derivative(tcp_activeopens, 1s, 0) as tcp_activeopens FROM (SELECT avg(tcp_activeopens) as tcp_activeopens FROM $database.net WHERE host = '$server' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval))
SELECT derivative(tcp_outrsts, 1s, 0) as tcp_outrsts FROM (SELECT avg(tcp_outrsts) as tcp_outrsts FROM $database.net WHERE host = '$server' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval))

SELECT derivative(tcp_passiveopens, 1s, 0) as tcp_passiveopens FROM (SELECT avg(tcp_passiveopens) as tcp_passiveopens FROM $database.net WHERE host = '$server' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval))
SELECT derivative(ip_indiscards, 1s, 0) FROM (SELECT avg(ip_indiscards) as ip_indiscards from $database.net WHERE (host = '$server') and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval))

SELECT derivative(ip6indiscards, 1s, 1) as ip6indiscards FROM (SELECT avg(ip6indiscards) as ip6indiscards FROM $database.nstat WHERE (host = '$server') and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval))

SELECT derivative(udp_indatagrams, 1s, 1) as in_datagrams FROM (select avg(udp_indatagrams) as udp_indatagrams  FROM $database.net WHERE host = '$server' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval( $interval))

SELECT derivative(udp_outdatagrams, 1s, 1) as out_datagrams FROM (select avg(udp_outdatagrams) as udp_outdatagrams  FROM $database.net WHERE host = '$server' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval( $interval))
SELECT derivative(bytes_recv,1s, 1) as bytes_in FROM $database.net WHERE host = '$server' and interface = '$netif' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to group by tbname
SELECT derivative(bytes_sent,1s, 1) as bytes_out FROM $database.net WHERE host = '$server' and interface = '$netif' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to group by tbname

SELECT derivative(packets_recv,1s, 0) as packets_recv FROM (SELECT avg(packets_recv) as packets_recv FROM $database.net WHERE host = '$server' and interface = '$netif' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval))

SELECT derivative(packets_sent,1s, 0) as packets_sent FROM (SELECT avg(packets_sent) as packets_sent FROM $database.net WHERE host = '$server' and interface = '$netif' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval))

SELECT derivative(drop_in,1s, 1) as drop_in FROM (SELECT avg(drop_in) as drop_in FROM $database.net WHERE host = '$server' and interface = '$netif' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval))

SELECT derivative(drop_out,1s, 1) as drop_out FROM (SELECT avg(drop_out) as drop_out FROM $database.net WHERE host = '$server' and interface = '$netif' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval))
SELECT derivative(err_in,1s, 1) as err_in FROM (SELECT avg(err_in) as err_in FROM $database.net WHERE host = '$server' and interface = '$netif' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval))

SELECT derivative(err_out,1s, 1) as err_out FROM (SELECT avg(err_out) as err_out FROM $database.net WHERE host = '$server' and interface = '$netif' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval))
SELECT derivative(_in, 1s, 0) as swap_in FROM (SELECT avg(_in) as _in from $database.swap WHERE host = '$server'  and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval))
SELECT derivative(out, 1s, 0) as swap_out FROM (SELECT avg(out) as out from $database.swap WHERE host = '$server'  and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval))
SELECT avg(used) as used, avg(total) as total FROM $database.swap WHERE host = '$server' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval)
SELECT derivative(reads,1s, 0) as read  FROM (SELECT avg(reads) as reads FROM $database.diskio WHERE host = '$server' and name = '$disk' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval))
SELECT derivative(writes,1s, 0) as write  FROM (SELECT avg(writes) as writes FROM $database.diskio WHERE host = '$server' and name = '$disk' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval))

SELECT derivative(read_bytes, 1s, 0) as read FROM (SELECT avg(read_bytes) as read_bytes FROM $database.diskio WHERE host = '$server' and name = '$disk' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval))

SELECT derivative(write_bytes,1s, 0) as write FROM (SELECT avg(write_bytes) as write_bytes FROM $database.diskio WHERE host = '$server' and name = '$disk' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval))

SELECT derivative(read_time,1s, 0) as read  FROM (SELECT avg(read_time) as read_time FROM $database.diskio WHERE host = '$server' and name = '$disk' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval))

SELECT derivative(write_time,1s, 0) as write  FROM (SELECT avg(write_time) as write_time FROM $database.diskio WHERE host = '$server' and name = '$disk' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval))
SELECT avg(total) AS total, avg(used) as used FROM $database.disk WHERE host = '$server' and path = '$mountpoint' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval)
SELECT avg(inodes_used) as used FROM $database.disk WHERE host = '$server' and path = '$mountpoint' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval)
SELECT avg(inodes_free) + avg(inodes_used) as total FROM $database.disk WHERE host = '$server' and path = '$mountpoint' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval)

title: Telegraf System Dashboard
